gifts3.name: Ticket to Cable gig
gifts3.description: The Cable has been known to throw a great party. Details to be confirmed but expect a great venue and local acts.

gifts3.name: Cable mug
gifts3.description: Beautiful custom designed mugs for sharing a warm pot of community-ownership.

gifts3.name: Journey to Justice mug
gifts3.description: (Very) limited edition mugs produced right here in Bristol by PRSC celebrating and memorialising Bristolians who have fought for our rights.

gifts5.name: Cable t-shirt
gifts5.description: Ethically produced on organic cotton, these stylish shirts will mark you out as someone who knows what’s going on.

gifts5.name: Custom Cable poster
gifts5.description: Designed by a local Cable illustrator, this beautiful A4 poster visualises the power of community media.

gifts5.name: £10 Watershed voucher
gifts5.description: You may or may not love independent cinema. Either way they show some cracking films at the Watershed.

gifts5.name: £10 Bristol Streetwear voucher
gifts5.description: The company that has gained notoriety for adding Bristol attitude and humour to high profile brands.

gifts5.name: £10 Tangent Books voucher
gifts5.description: Founded in 2004, Tangent Books is the go to for everything from real guides to Bristol, radical history and more.
